scripts.get-packages: yarn && cd src && yarn && cd client && yarn
scripts.postbuild-modules: cd functions && yarn && cd client && yarn
scripts.deploy: bash scripts/set-prod-env.sh && bash scripts/build-client.sh && firebase deploy
scripts.dev: bash scripts/set-dev-env.sh && concurrently "nodemon src/index.js" "cd src/client && yarn start"
